sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_a1a05b3edba7b20086da7d5e0f961999
sys_update_xml.payload: c$wlu-bg-color: #000 !default; >div { margin-top: 20px; background-color: $wlu-bg-color; .user-avatar-pic { display: block; float: left; width: 53px; height: 53px; border-radius: 50%; border: solid 3px #404757; } .user-greeting { float: left; margin-left: 7px; margin-top: 5px; } .title { font-size: 16px; } .subtitle { font-size: 14px; margin-top: 2; } } .notification-icon { position: absolute; right: 15px; border-left: solid 1px #3A3F4C; padding-left: 17px; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; .number { font-size: 22px; font-weight: 600; color: #FFF; background-color: #c6503b; border-radius: 50%; width: 30px; height: 30px; } .notification-label { font-size: 14px; } } .notification { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 58px; padding: 10px; z-index: 5; width: 100%; .notification-wrapper { background-color: $wlu-bg-color; float: left; width: 100%; padding: 13px 15px; border-radius: 3px; } .tip { position: absolute; right: 34px; top: 0; } h2 { text-transform: uppercase; margin: 0; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; } .icon { svg { width: 25px; height: 25px; } } }sp_instancefalsewelcome-userfalseWelcome Userfalsefalsesp_widgetfabio.petito2017-06-28 09:58:52truea1a05b3edba7b20086da7d5e0f96199941Welcome Userglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_a1a05b3edba7b20086da7d5e0f961999fabio.petito2017-07-03 14:21:12
